wiki.summary: “7AM On Bridle Path” is the 14th track from Drake’s 6th studio album, and the latest instalment of his “AM/PM” series he’s been doing since 2010’s “9AM in Dallas”. The song takes its name from the upscale residential neighbourhood in North York, Toronto, Canada – the location of Drake’s $6.7 million dollar mansion. The Bridle Path, along with Forest Hill (the neighbourhood Drake spent a portion of his childhood growing up in) are among the top five wealthiest neighbourhoods in Canada. Read more on Last.fm.
